text: Launcher X is a launcher application for Palm OS originally made by Little Mobile Creations, and acquired by Get Mobile Solutions in May 2006.Launcher X web site, A little history... . Accessed on January 18, 2007. It is an interface that allows users to access both their internal handheld memory and memory card programs on one screen. It organizes icons in tab windows.Dave Johnson, Rick Broida, How to Do Everything with Your Palm Handheld, McGraw- Hill Professional, 2005, p. 283. ==References== ==External links== *Official web site Category:Palm OS software Category:Application launchers
title: Launcher X
